SMW Subobject for (p+)High Alchemy value: 480Buy limit: 11000Examine: Venomous-looking arrows.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Dragon arrowImage: File:Dragon arrow(p) 1.png, File:Dragon arrow(p) 2.png, File:Dragon arrow(p) 3.png, File:Dragon arrow(p) 4.png, File:Dragon arrow(p) 5.pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.000Value: 800Version anchor: Poison+Release date: 11 June 2007Item ID: 11228

A dragon arrow is the strongest type of arrow in Old School RuneScape. It is only usable with the dark bow, the twisted bow and the 3rd age bow.

They can be created through the Fletching skill at level 90 by using dragon arrowtips on headless arrows, granting 15 Fletching experience per arrow made. 15 arrows can be made at a time, giving 225 Fletching experience.

When used with a dark bow, dragon arrows will enhance its special attack.

When used with weapon poison or weapon poison (p++), 5 arrows will be converted at a time.

Ironmen who own a twisted bow are advised to fletch amethyst arrows to use as ammunition as opposed to trying to obtain large amounts of dragon arrows, due to the latter's methods of obtaining being heavily reliant on luck and only slightly greater ranged strength.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When the 3rd age bow was released, it was originally intended to shoot up to dragon arrows. However, a technical problem prevented this; it was later fixed with the release of the Chambers of Xeric.

[[File:Dragon arrow detail.png|left|120px]]
A '''dragon arrow''' is the strongest type of [[arrow]] in ''[[Old School RuneScape]]''. It is only usable with the [[dark bow]], the [[twisted bow]] and the [[3rd age bow]].

They can be created through the [[Fletching]] [[skill]] at level 90 by using [[dragon arrowtips]] on [[headless arrow]]s, granting 15 Fletching [[experience]] per arrow made. 15 arrows can be made at a time, giving 225 Fletching experience.

When used with a dark bow, dragon arrows will enhance its [[Special attack#Ranged weapons|special attack]].

When used with weapon poison or weapon poison (p++), 5 arrows will be converted at a time.

[[Ironman Mode|Ironmen]] who own a twisted bow are advised to fletch [[amethyst arrow]]s to use as ammunition as opposed to trying to obtain large amounts of dragon arrows, due to the latter's methods of obtaining being heavily reliant on luck and only slightly greater ranged strength.
